item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 67
item.description: Audio quality is off this week due to a move to a laptop, working on that for next show. Dry topics and new week. E3 is coming up soon. We did manage to talk about Men In Black 3, GI Joe, Battlestar Galactica, God Bless America, John Carter, World of Tanks, Top Gun, Enterprise, Farscape, Diablo 3, Major malware sweeping the internet, DISH DVR, Comcast update, and FiOS Speeds.

item.description: Ben and Josh have talk about the series finale of House M.D.. SPOILER ALERT!
item.itunes:author: GeekedOutPodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 66
item.description: ISP Issues! We wanted to Skypecast last week and couldn't and then delays! So we are revamping our set up. Ben will be building a studio at his place and more small changes to come. This week, we talk DIABLO 3, The Avengers, fall TV ending, House, How I Met Your Mother, Game of Thrones, Verizon sucks, Comcast Sucks, Hard Drive Crisis or lack there of, Xbox 360 price cuts, and more. Show will be bi-weekly on Thursdays! We are dedicated to this schedule and more shows could come if news and topics pick up.
item.itunes:author: GeekedOutPodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 65
item.description: New Co-Host Ben Jones begins the next chapter of the show! We talk World of Tanks, America: The Story of Us, Jericho, Fido, Sherlock Holmes, Mission Impossible, Full Metal Jousting, Sopranos, Game of Thrones, Nazis at the Center of the Earth, Star Trek Online, Arrested Development on Netflix, Netflix and Comcast on net neutrality, HBO sucks, Hulu producing original shows, Adobe goes subscription, Phone hardware catching up with Xbox 360 power, Shatner loves his fans, a robotic red light district, Facebook revenge, Google Drive, Star Wars 1.2, Windows 8, and Diablo 3 open beta.
item.itunes:author: GeekedOutPodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 64
item.description: Chris is departing the show. We talk about the past and future. Also hit some new topics for old time sakes. Next show will be with new co-host!
item.itunes:author: GeekedOutPodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 63
item.description: Recording and release schedule for the show will be changing. Life is getting in the way. Not sure how it will impact the show but we will produce content. Anyways...Ashton joins us this week. We talk about GDC announcements, Ipad, and a bunch of other geek topics!
item.itunes:author: GeekedOutPodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 62
item.description: Finally back together! Not a lot of news this week but the guys talk about what they have been up to the past few weeks. DC Trip for Josh and Chucky Cheese trip for Chris.

We talk How I Met Your Mother, Ducktales, Dead Poets Society, Hall Pass, Moneyball, Under Siege, Star Trek Online is F2P, Monster, Premonition, Rascal Flatts, Homeland, Steve Jobs, Dance Central 2, Rise of the Planet of the Apes, How Beer Saved the World, Raspberrypi, Fedora 16, CES madness, Kinect for Windows, Wifi Digicams, Nokia, Ultrabooks, OLED, PC/TVs, Roku stream, Halo Charging, Dish dishes out faster speeds, Gigabit Wifi, X prize for a tricorder, Diablo 3, MW3, DnD 5th Ed., Resident Evil 6, Golden Globes, BBC on Amazon, WB Sucks, Netflix on Vita, UbuntuTV, Comcast App streams Live TV, Doomsday Clock adds a minute, Zapps Hacked, and...TONY TOPIC!

item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 16
item.description: Black Friday is bullshit, Josh gets an iPhone, PlayOn and Netflix on iPhone, HTC has antenna issues now, Txt 911, Happy Birthday Xbox 360, XBL to compete with Netflix, Kinect stuff, XBL Rewards, Netflix wants to squash Hulu, HBO blows, Flix on Stix, GoogleTV DOA?, World Cup should have gone to Japan in 2022, and the late Leslie Nielsen.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 15
item.description: It's our Ditch Cable/Satellite episode with guest Shawn Smith and James Roberts. We also talk about The Walking Dead, Castlevania, Casino, Minecraft, A-team, Hulu's price drop, 103 inch 3D TV, Codemasters blames used game sales for their shitty bottomline, Black Ops set sales record, OnLive Console, and Happy Birthday Windows.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 14
item.description: Macbook Air thoughts, Welcome to Macintosh, Cashback, Virtual Girl, Teen Wolf, Eddie Izzard, MINECRAFT, Black Ops Review, Kinect injuries, Star Wars on Kinect, Boxee Box, Spiderman Reboot, Bond 23, Another Star Wars Trilogy, No KHHHAANN in Star Trek, Xfiles 3, Simpsons will hit 500 episodes, SHIT on Network TV, Walking Dead Renewed, Twinkies Diet, Drive Thru for Sex Toys, and Hatsune Miku.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 13
item.description: Josh's trip to St. Louis and Gameapalooza follow-up, Challenges Issued, American Pickers, The Walking Dead, Netflix traffic is the internet now, Porn industry sucks like RIAA, is there a porn type Netflix? YES!, Kinect, Justify XBL Price hike, EA on Quality, Lazer power, and the Enterprise now has a manual.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 12
item.description: Belly Button Lint, DVD2Blu, Roku hates PlayOn, Playstation Phone, Sony bribes you to Play, BIG ASS IPHONE, Pre-released Kinect means no XBL, 3D Oakleys, Mom kills kid over Farmville, Minecraft, Shuttle Discovery, Avartar Sequels, STO Mission Creator, Germany is still Nazi Germany, Mt Everest has Internet, Verizon Plans, HULC, Jackass 3D, Back to the Future, and Gameapalooza!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 11
item.description: NES turns 25, Kinect stuff, Steam, Netflix, Windows Live, App stores, Hulu, GoogleTV, Glee in GQ, and screw you Gene Simmons!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 10
item.description: Special guest Shawn Smith. More on the Fall TV shows, A-Team Movie, Medal Of Honor, Redbox to offer Games, Nintendo Sales Slow, PS3 may have something with firmware to fight piracy, PS3ers rejoice for discless Netflix, Steam Trade In Market?, Ipad for sale EVERYWHERE, Black Friday sucks, Windows Phone 7, Digg CEO knows that v4 Sucks, 25th Anniversary of Back to the Future, Minka Kelly is HOT, emails and more!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 9
item.description: Duke Nukem footage, Cataclysm, CoD in 3D, Jack Thompson tells gamers to go to Hell, UEFI, Geek Squad sucks, Gene Simmons wants to sue all those that P2P, Verizon and ATT pay people back, Awkward Family Photos the sitcom...., Jessica Alba is UGLY!, and Weezer sucks.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and TheVulgarGamer.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 8
item.description: What is good so far and what is not with the new fall TV season, Hurt Locker gonna hurt file sharers in their pockets, so will porn studios, Star Wars in 3D, MINECRAFT, EA renames the Taliban, Free MMOG Star Trek Game based on DS9 timeline, Parents are clueless about kids playing games online, Gears of War 3 DELAYED, Wiimote Vibrator, Seaway kills boss, Smaller Ipad coming, our thoughts on tablets....
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 7
item.description: Thoughts on the Fall TV Shows, Minecraft Madness, Medal of Honor Beta, Digital Downloads outs Box Sales, Gaming Free Speech, Intel upgrades...via software?, Oakley gets 3D, BIG ASS JUMBO TRON, Jeff Zucker Sucks and is FIRED!, More Netflix goodness, Blockbuster BUST!, Cell phone data plans, Shuttle Discovery, and Raptorface closing its doors for something VULGAR!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 6
item.description: OSX sucks as bad as Windows, Breaking Bad, Tru Blood the drink!, Halo Reach Hard Drive Issues, Kinect Games, Xbox 360 for 5 more years, Tokyo Game Show, FPS gamers rule all, Steam Wallet, violent game ban, OLED technology, More on used game sales, Trojan that blackmales you, Eve Online heist, Ipad killing netbook sales, Playstation Move debutes, Campers suck, and IT Crowd Returns in 2011.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 5
item.description: Here You Have email virus, Wrath of Khan, Star Trek Of Gods and Men, Adverntureland, Breaking Bad, Mad Men, Flashpoint, Surviving the Cut, Iron Man 2, Origin PC, 1981 PC Plays Motion Video, PC v Console, Batman, XBL Names, L4D Comic, Windows Mobile 7, Onstar and Facebook, Jack Thompson sucks again, Optical Illusion Safety, and Urine Whiskey...yuck!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 4
item.description: Guest, Friend, and former LANCast member, Kevin Bowyer joins us this week. We talked the Emmy award winners, Ghostbusters, Generation Kill, Inception, Machete, True Blood Update, YouTube going Pay Per View, Computer Issues, ATI goes bye bye, Microsoft sucks with their increased prices but throw out a new controller, Iphone 4 re-released, Kevin's small reviews, Snoop Dogg on Rock Band, and HOLY CRAP KILL ME NOW...Dukem Nukem Forever is REAL and at PAX!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 3
item.description: More technical issues with BSOD 3 times! True Blood, Friday Night Lights, Scott Pilgrim v The World, Michael Cera sucks, Battleship the Game the Movie?, Mila kissies Natalie, Indy 5, Star Trek, Netflix again, piracy, NASA, Pandora, Sony sucks, EA rules with MoH, two dudes fight on and off line, Xbox and Windows Mobile 7, Bioshock, Prius, and FIRE THE "laser"!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 2
item.description: We moved into a better sounding room! We talk Expendables, Star Trek, Control Alt Delete, Punch Drunk Love, Star Wars on Bluray, 3D Everything, HBO hates Netflix, ISP data use, XBLA and Windows Mobile 7, Places, RAGE, Nvidia going CPU, BFG sucks, Intel rules, and more!
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com

item.title: Geeked Out Podcast Episode 1
item.description: LANGaming.net and LANCast are gone forever, but from the ashes...geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com rise to start the Geeked Out Podcast! Chris and Josh host a weekly show about technology, TV, Movies, Gaming, and more geekiness topics.
item.itunes:author: geekedoutpodcast.com and Raptorface.com

item.title: Dropped Packets Episode 1
item.description: LANGaming is back, even better than ever! We have refined our podcast into what we do great, talking about what we play, whats going in the news, and what media we have been watching.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 47 - The Last LANCast
item.description: The title of the show says it all. As LANGaming.Net hits their 2 year anniversary; Chris, Josh, James, Jadie, and Ben talk about some of the latest news one last time. Discussion this week is a retrospective of LANGaming.Net and LANCast. We may say goodbye to LANCast but the show will still go on! Stay Tuned!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 46 - Rated A For Awesome!
item.description: Chris, Jadie, Sam and good ol' JOSH gather around in the bunker to chat about video game movies and licensed games. We have some great news, followed by some great fun with geography, movies, and comic books.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 45 - Tree Pose
item.description: Chris, Jadie, and our newest podcaster and awesome features writer Richard discuss games meant to improve the gamer on our second skypecast. After a few bits of news the crew gives up a break to talk about how effective Wii Fit and Brain age are when it comes to actually improving someone.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 44 - Aust-What Sam?
item.description: Chris, Sam, and James join in on LANGamings very first Skypecast to talk about casual gaming. As always, we talk about our favorites, what we like and don't like and what can be done to improve gaming for casual gamers, and casual games. We also find out that the Australian government does not like Sam!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 43 - DRANK!
item.description: Chris, James, Jadie and Sam group up to chat about some crazy, and depressing news. We follow that up with a big helping of talk about all things controllers. We go through our most favorite controllers, the ones we hated, and what we like to see in a controller.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 42 - Noobsauce
item.description: An epic podcast featuring Chris, James, Ben, Jadie, and our newest staff member Sam!. After a HUGE amount of news, we get down to business with talking about noobs. We share stories about our experiences with new players and noobs alike. We chat about tips to not be a noob, and how to learn how to play a game.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars,black,friday

item.title: LANCast 41 - Co-Op for Life
item.description: Ben, Chris, Jadie, and James share their experiences and thoughts on gaming in relationships after some quite depressing news. How does gaming effect our staff's relationships? Listen and find out, and recieve some wise advice from all.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 40 - Funtacular!!!
item.description: You have been waiting for it, so here it is! A second helping of the funtacular. Be prepared to laugh away with Chris, Josh, James, Jadie, Shawn, and Ben as they attempt to answer all kinds of different questions thrown there way. Who will be the winner? Listen and find out!!!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Black Friday 2008
item.description: Josh does his annual LANCast with his picks for Black Friday!

item.title: LANCast - Episode 39 - 360 Degrees of LANCast
item.description: Josh, Chris, Jadie, and new comer Ben begin the show with a healthy dose of news from all different corners of the gaming world. The main topic involves games that we are going to miss this holiday season due to the mass amount being pumped out at once. When will publishers realize that a constant flow of games lets us buy more?

item.title: LANCast - Episode 38 - Used LANCast Sales
item.description: Josh, Chris, James and Kevin group up to chat about all things used games. Do we like em? Do we go for the used game sales? What makes used game appealing and what we don't like about buying and selling used games.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 37 - New LANCast Experience
item.description: Josh, Chris, James and Shawn join forces for LANCast 37. The news gets a little heated as we talk about Microsoft getting sued over the RROD on the 360. The main topic is all about interfaces on consoles, what we like to see, what we dont like to see.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: XBOX, XBOX 360, Consoles, Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 36 - From The Ground Up!
item.description: Josh, Chris, Kevin, and Jadie enjoy another fun filled LANCast without James. Loads of news about new games coming out, as well as plenty of rumors that we throw out. Our discussion involves starting and running a gaming website. We also chat about what makes a website look or feel better then others, as well as whats needed to keep a gaming website running
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 35 - Where's My HD DVDs?
item.description: Josh, Chris, Jadie and Kevin team up this week to discuss the lifetpan of game systems. All kinds of stories surface on different LANCasters life with different consoles.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 34 - Remeber to Save
item.description: James, Kevin, Shawn and Chris join up to talk about saving in games. The gang starts with a history of saving in games, followed by what is needed in certain games for a save system.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 33 - LANCon
item.description: An interesting bunch of LANCasters this week, as Josh, Chris, Kevin, and Shawn discuss their thoughts and experiences with different gaming and gaming related conventions. The crew brings this episode home by giving out a cryptic message regarding next year, as well as an important safety announcement.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 32 - Update?
item.description: The LANCast crew is back for more. James, Kevin, Chris, and Jaidee have a lengthy discussion about Soul Caliber 4, as well as the Gamestops attempt to bring in the female players. The main discussion revolves around different characters in games. We wrap up the LANCast with a few suggestions for what movies to check out.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Characters, Soul Caliber, Movies,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 31 - Diabeetus
item.description: Season 2 is off to a wicked start in the new bunker at Chris's House. This show includes Kevin, Chris, James, Josh (for the first half), and Forum Mod JadieLady. Yes with our first female guest we tackle sexism in gaming. But not before touching on E3 and a backlog of conquests. So join us and by all means do not be offended.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Sex,Sexism,Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 30 - Sensational Trivia Funtacular
item.description: Kevin, Josh, Chris and Eric gather together to take on James' grueling trivia. But before that they indulge in a heavy helping of Current Conquests and Beer. We also have plenty of news on tap. So grab a glass and take a seat.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 29 - Awaiting a Patch...
item.description: Kevin, James, Josh and Chris discuss the unending need for patches on games right out of the gate. Why are they broken on release? This is paired up with a huge helping of news with a generous portion of bitching.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 28 - Like a Record
item.description: Kevin, James, Josh, and Chris begin the show with a variety of current conquests. Followed by a massive chunk of news including a spinning game of Kevin's. During the Discussion about Music games we are joined by our new staff member, Eric. Listen for laughs, opinions, and for this weeks winner.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 27 - Das Boot
item.description: This week we shake things up as Kevin, James and Chris are joined by a mystery 4th and 5th chair. Plenty of great current conquests are followed by a whole smattering of news, including EA backing down after gamer backlash again. Then we move to a discussion that had more than one LANcaster ending up with their foot in their mouth "Bigotry in Gaming". Some great questions from the forum are answered and another $20 winner is choosen. Enjoy and keep posting LANners.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 26 - The MMO
item.description: This week with the guys comfortably back in the present they immediately get down on some modern gaming. Starting out with a solid dose of Current Conquests, followed with a variety of news including pricing details of the upcoming Conan MMO. This all leads into a discussion about the whole MMO craze, GTA and Call of Duty MMOs? Do we need these things? The guys discuss, and answer questions from the forums. Who won this week? Listen to find out.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 7 - LANCast to the Future
item.description: Special episode to kick off the one year anniversary of LANGaming.Net and LANCast! Troy invents a new gaming box that ends up throwing the guys back to 1989! Will they get back to the future???? Find out now!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 25 - A Developer by Any Other Name...
item.description: This week Kevin, James, and Chris get together for a high impact episode 25. Covering the incredible new information about the Zerg, and the hostile attempts of EA towards Take Two. The discussion of the week is Developers what does a name mean, and how does it affect us gamers. And of course there is plenty of Smash Bros. talk.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 24 - 100 LAN Points!
item.description: The cast as always with the newbie Chris (Kevin did not scare him away). We go through what we have been playing including a view of Requiem:Bloodymare beta from Troy. Discussion this time is achievement points, are they a curse or a blessing. Finally a well rounded dropped packets including Princess Peach's panties and a shocking surprise!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 23 - Welcome Tabletop Gaming...oh and Chris!
item.description: Shawn, Troy, Kevin, James, and our newest features writer Chris all come together to discuss the things you love. Starting with what we are all playing (now four to one have experienced WOW, will Kevin be able to hold out?). News about a new computer coalition, RTSes and consoles, and more. Troy clears the room as the rest remain to delve into Tabletop RPGs and discuss the advantages of premade content versus that brewed by the DM.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 22 - LANs We Love
item.description: This week Shawn, Troy, James and Josh...wait what? Yes Josh the head of operations returns to discuss with us the types of LAN parties we enjoy and why. In the news we discuss Steams new offer, the Conan MMO, the new Battlefield and much more. Kevin is currently out due to wisdom teeth removal. Wish him well!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 21 - Death and Consequences
item.description: This week Shawn, Kevin, and James cover the remake of Bionic Commando. But is that happy news enough to offset the Star Trek MMO problems? The Discussion this week considers death as a punishment in games, how should it be handled? That and Kevin got to see the new Uwe Boll movie, In The Name of The King: A Dungeon Siege Tale. All this and a special segment recapping Troy and Josh's trip to Carolina LAN.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Death,Starcraft,Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 20 - Year In Review
item.description: With a full cast and a full plate of information, join the guys as they cover Wii smacking, and getting bent over by Toys'R'Us. Then dive into the big wrap up covering this past year of multiplayer gaming and what it had to offer.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 19 - Holiday Gaming
item.description: James, Kevin, and Troy get together and chat about the news including the cock waving between Activision and Harmonix. Also some questionable parenting in Hong Kong. Then the main discussion is gaming gifts. With some both heart felt and hilarious tales. Happy Holidays Everyone!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 18 - Ethics and Boobs
item.description: Finally the cast is whole. Shawn, James, Kevin, and Troy. Bring the full gambit discussing the major news about Activision Blizzard and The Gerstmann Incident. That leads us into our Discussion of Reviewer Ethics and eventually topless Wii. Yes you get it all in this one.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 17 - Doomed to Rock
item.description: With the holiday week in full swing the cast is whittled down to James and Troy, but that does not stop them from carrying on about Rock Band and Call of Duty 4. In the news we discuss Atari's continuing business struggle, the return of Interplay, and more. Finally we have a nice talk with Troy about his latest CD based on the Doom games, and James sends out a special thanks to Backbone Entertainment.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Black Friday 2007
item.description: Josh and James talk about the upcoming deals for Black Friday, experiences, and tips!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 16 - Crazy Kids and their "Butt Hash"
item.description: Discussion of the week - Pre-Orders. Also talk about the crazy kids of today...hitting mom over Halo? Cory Barlog leaves SCEA, Circuit City and their retraction of the CoD4/CoD3 deal, Metal Gear Solid 4 pushed back till Q2 08, and Nvidia's profits. End with crazy kids and their Butt Hash....listen for more. Welcome Troy back to the show as a regular!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 15 - Giveaway Results and a Departure
item.description: Our top discussion of the week is a One Console Future, Could It Work? We also talk about Valve cutting off imports, Capcom's latest, Xbox with HD-DVD rumors, Bioware MMO, and more game delays announced. Plus, what all have been waiting for...the Giveaway results! BREAKING....One of the LANCasters leaves the show!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 14 - Major Site Construction Complete! Giveaway Announcement!
item.description: This week our main discussion is our favorite multiplayer games of all time. We also talk about Battlefield 3 rumors, 10 yr old suicide in Russia over being grounded from his PC, bonus PC content for Gears of War, Sonic in Smash Bros., EA pulling out their wallet again, and notes from the Nintendo Conference. BIG ANNOUNCMENT!!! LANGaming.NET's Giveaway!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
item.itunes:keywords: Quake,E3,LANGaming,LAN,Gamer,Xbox,360,Playstation,LANCast,Jaffe, Billy Mitchell,Halo,LANCast,Jack Thompson,Barney,Uwe Boll,EA,Gears of Wars

item.title: LANCast - Episode 13 - "In between my purple butt cheeks..."
item.description: BIG Debate on Physical copies of games versus digital downloads. More with Jack Thompson in the news, Playstation Store, $9700 WOW character, binge gaming, and UT3 not cross-platform.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 12 - "A lot of potential babies died, alright!"
item.description: Our LAN Party recap from the weekend before. FASA Closing! WSVG cancelled! Halo Marketing, are they hiding a bad game? Enemy Territory: Quake Wars Demo and our new server. Main topic, Quest games from the 80's early 90's.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 11 - Billy Mitchell is a douche!
item.description: LANcasters talk about the headlines of the past two weeks, Billy Mitchell and the movie King of Kong, and the main topic of the evening; Fighting games and their impact on multiplayer gaming. Also the results of Contest of Despair 4 and a hint at the upcoming contest 5.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 10 - It's Better Than Playing with Yourself
item.description: Josh makes his return to LANCast with regulars Kevin and James. We talk about licensed games that should be, debate Windows Live versus Steam, dream about David Jaffe.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 9 - The World's Smallest Violin
item.description: Just the two of us this time. Kevin and James talk about a lost DS, the Contest of Despair 3, Game delays and music, and our dream interviews.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 8 - Do you like Bill Laimbeer's Combat Basketball, and getting caught in the rain?
item.description: This week the trio found their way back to the LANgaming.net office to share opinions on what came out of E3 as well as what is the most difficult genre in gaming. Also, contest winners are announced, hearts are broken and Contest of Despair 2 is kicked off. All that and Kevin's obsession with Cliffy B.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 6 - Shirtless and a Shot of Whiskey
item.description: Join Lancasters Kevin, James, and Shawn in a serious topic (for a change) regarding ESRB ratings and moral responsibility. Also, get the details to enter in the first CONTEST of DESPAIR. Finally, some E3 predictions bring things to a close for the new crew.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 5 - Triangles or Squares...it is All a Circle
item.description: Smitty and Zuld join us while Kevin is out of town. We talk about how copy protection hurts LAN Parties and PC gaming, Sequels we would like to see, and is reading FAQs and Walkthroughs cheating?
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 4 - Hope you're rollin' 20s Daniel, every roll...RIP
item.description: Games talked about this week: Starcraft 2, Dirty Dancing, Dirt, Fight Night Round 3, Aegis Wing, and more! Troy joins us once again but this time to talk about this CD release of video game tunes. Straight out of our forums, Quazi aka Blake joins us to talk about "Shitter" Games, Memorial Boss fights, and Why the hell do we have to work so hard to unlock or gain bonus material in games.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 3 - Come On Down!
item.description: James, Kevin, and Josh are joined by Troy. This week we talk about VT Rampage and the guy behind it, Sony's Gamer Day, and are LAN Parties close to death? Plus our show is dedicated to Bob Barker's retirement from the Price is Right!
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 2 - Lifebars...You Precious Little Lifebars....
item.description: This week we talk about upcoming changes to the LANCast to make our show more professional sounding. Josh give his thoughts on the 360 Elite that he purchased. James talks about the latest Pokemon game. Kevin "talks" about lifebars and menus in games and how no developer puts much thought in making anything but bars, nice rant session. We have guest Tom (Elwappo) and Troy (Tacomonkeygod) join us to talk about World of Warcraft and why guys play as females in games. Too much to mention here in our 1 hour and 22 min LANCast.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net

item.title: LANCast - Episode 1 - Pilot
item.description: Josh, James, and Kevin first podcast! They talk about Mario and how Josh thinks it is time for Mario to stepdown and make room for another gaming icon, the Xbox 360 Elite release, and how Virtual Console and the Marketplace are ripoffs. The guys to talk about more with this 1 hour and 30 min show.
item.itunes:author: LANGaming.Net
